wsl_league_01: World eSports League is a global eSports brand newly launched in 2021.
wsl_league_02: It is planned by eSport experts at TechnoBlood, which has been holding eSports events for more than 17 years since 2003.
wsl_festival_02: players (teams) from 100+ countries affiliated with IESF will participate in the WSL,
wsl_festival_03: and the contents of the competition will be broadcast in multiple languages.
playpot_01: PLAYPOT supports global online tournaments as an online tournament platform.
playpot_02: PLAYPOT tournament bracket creation, abusing player prevention, personal record management, etc.
playpot_03: WSL uses PLAYPOT to hold the competition.
